import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./BeforeAfterImage.css';import beforeImage from'./img/befrrImg.png';import afterImage from'./img/after.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BeforeAfterImage=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const parent=document.querySelector('.splitview');const topPanel=parent.querySelector('.top');const handle=parent.querySelector('.handle');let skewHack=0;let delta=0;if(parent.className.indexOf('skewed')!==-1){skewHack=1000;}const onMouseMove=event=>{// delta = (event.clientX - 700 / 2) * 0.5;
handle.style.left="".concat(event.clientX+delta,"px");topPanel.style.width="".concat(event.clientX+skewHack+delta,"px");};parent.addEventListener('mousemove',onMouseMove);return()=>{parent.removeEventListener('mousemove',onMouseMove);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"splitview skewed",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"panel bottom",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"Before",src:beforeImage,className:"home1-image04"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"panel top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"After",src:afterImage,className:"home1-image04"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"handle",role:"separator","aria-valuemin":"0","aria-valuemax":"100","aria-valuenow":"50","aria-orientation":"horizontal",tabIndex:"0"})]});};export default BeforeAfterImage;
